logd_helper(8) System Manager's Manual logd_helper(8)

NAME

logd_helper —
unified logging system daemon helper

DESCRIPTION

logd_helper is a helper daemon that performs various services for logd(8).

logd_helper should not be invoked directly. It is intended only for use by logd(8).

SEE ALSO

logd(8)
December 10, 2019 Darwin
